## Emulator.utxos() method

Retrieves the Emulator's ledger as an array of UTxOs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
utxos(): TransactionUnspentOutput[];
```
**Returns:**

TransactionUnspentOutput\[\]

The full list of UTxOs in the Emulator's ledger.
